name: Swoothe
description:
Experiment to your heart's content

Swoothe is a 2D Puzzle game were the player takes on various tasks related to chemistry such as the various methods of separation or the rate of diffusion of gas.

Features:

  • Experimentation
  • Chemistry
  • Puzzle Solving

Controls:

Pretty Straight forward. Point and click 

Team credits:

Octávio Silva (Game Developer)
